title: When does Sinead die in Coronation Street?
text:
Sinead’s exit scenes will play out soon (Picture: ITV)

Sinead Tinker’s devastating storyline in Coronation Street, which has seen her diagnosed with terminal cervical cancer, has won actress Katie McGlynn endless praise for her performance in episodes covering such a sensitive but important topic.

Next week, Corrie will air scenes where Kirk, Beth and Craig surprise a thrilled Sinead by having an impromptu Christmas celebration after learning that the mum won’t make it through to the festive period.

In the following episodes there will be emotional scenes as Sinead records messages for her baby son in an effort to capture how much she loves him, for Bertie to watch in the future when she is no longer there to tell him in person.

So, with Sinead’s storyline reaching a crescendo and her final days seemingly approaching very fast, when will we see Sinead say goodbye for good on Corrie?

When does Sinead die in Coronation Street?

Tissues at the ready Coronation Street fans, Sinead Tinker’s heartbreaking final scenes are due to air next week.

Katie’s final episode, and Sinead’s exit scenes, will play out on Friday 25 October 2019, where viewers will see both the Barlow and Tinker families congregate in the Rovers to await news on Sinead and share stories and fond memories about her.

Everyone awaits news about Sinead in Coronation Street (Picture: ITV)

Talking about her decision to leave Corrie and the moment she found out that soap bosses had decided to kill her character off actress Katie told Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield on This Morning: ‘I know it sounds very sadistic but I wanted her to die because that’s real life and life isn’t a fairytale.

‘Loads of women are dying, so many people are affected by cancer and this storyline triggers so many emotions for so many people because it’s absolutely heartbreaking.’

Coronation Street continues tonight at 7.30pm on ITV.
